properties.entry: SELECT A.CATEGORY_CODE, A.CATEGORY_NAME, B.CLOTHES_CODE, B.CLOTHES_NAME, B.CLOTHES_PRICE, B.ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_CATEGORY A JOIN TBL_CLOTHES B ON A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE
INSERT INTO TBL_CLOTHES ( CLOTHES_CODE, CLOTHES_NAME, CLOTHES_PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE, ORDERABLE_STATUS ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE TBL_CLOTHES SET CLOTHES_NAME = ?, CLOTHES_PRICE = ?, CATEGORY_CODE = ?, ORDERABLE_STATUS = ? WHERE CLOTHES_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? )
